projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration. Built with modern web technologies for scalability and performance.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features. Includes user roles and project management capabilities.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard that provides real-time weather data, forecasts, and interactive maps. Features location search, weather alerts, and beautiful data visualizations.
